Wolfcamp Aquifer (New Mexico and Texas) data (from Cressie, 1993)
Easting (miles) Northing (miles) Potentiometric level (kft)
Philip and Kitanidis (1989, Geostatistical estimation of hydraulic 
head gradients, Ground Water, v. 27, no. 6, p. 855-865) state that 
the origin is at longitude -102 degrees and at a latitude 2300 miles 
north of the equator.
